law.text: The Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall monitor radioactive waste material sites in Kentucky for the protection of the public health, safety, and welfare. The Finance and Administration Cabinet and the Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall cooperate and coordinate their activities in the leasing, regulation, monitoring, and control of radioactive waste material burial sites.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 376, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 317, effective July 15, 1998. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 279, sec. 4, effective June 17, 1978.
